messages.content: I bought an Adidas T-shirt last month. Could you find the invoice and save it to /user?

<function_thought>
To find the invoice for the Adidas T-shirt, I need to first view the order history to locate the specific order ID associated with that purchase. After obtaining the order ID, I can then retrieve the invoice details and save it to the specified path. Therefore, the next step is to execute the 'view_order_history' function.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[view_order_history()]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-104674")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_call>[create_file(path="/user/invoice_ORDER-104674.txt", content="The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.")]</function_call>
